reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toy for 1yo
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this as a gift to a friend because I had been gifted this to my first child when he turned 1 - best present ever. Typical 1-year-olds will love this, it's simple enough to put the cars on the race tracks and they get super excited about seeing the end result. Not only that, as this is very durable, my son played with it almost until he turned 2 (he is now 3), and my second child just turned 1 and loves it as well, definitely her favorite toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprising quality, for such a great value!
reviews.reviewText: I really like it so far! It's a present for CHRISTmas for our son who will be 10 months then. He is likely too young to play with it much at first, but will really enjoy watching the cars. Our 5 year old has a track and our youngest son just laughs and laughs, watching big brother play with it. Bonus, big brother played with it for about 15 minutes when it arrived and even at 5 he really likes it and was so creative in all the ways he thought to send the cars and even some other toys down the ramp. Our little guy will need supervision with the cars for a while, because he tests things in his mouth, but it will be worth it to supervise his play with it until he will be safe to play with the cars on his own. It seems rather solid and very well painted. We really like it so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is real wood and such fun! My two year old is obsessed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small table top sized car ramp.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s a nice little car ramp. It works relatively well. Sometimes the cars do get stuck on the second (yellow) or third (red) ramps which doesn't frustrate my 20 month old, but it does gunk up the train of cars. It is smaller than I expected, but it is perfect for table top play. It feels quite small when it’s on the floor and your child is hunched over it. The cars a very tiny, very tiny, which makes sense when you see how small this ramp is, but my son has no problem handling them. My other critique is there really should be somewhere to store the cars. Perhaps a divot in the bottom where the cars can slide in, otherwise I feel people are much more likely to loose them — especially when the cars are so small. The last thing I would love, but this one is being nit-picky, but if there was a car collector at the bottom, like in a marble run that would be 👌🏼.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for our two year old he loves it so fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for toddler
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a present for my 18 months old grandson. I was a bit concerned about the size of the 'cars' possibly being a choking hazard since there was no info about the size of the cars in the description. I posted a message on the site and the seller answered shortly afterwards with the dimensions of the cars. I bought it and my grandson LOVED it. He played with it for long stretches of time.It is well made and sturdy, the wood is smooth and so are the little cars. The little cars are big enough that they do not pose a choking hazard for an 18 months old. I love it and am glad I purchased it for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Super cute, both kids like playing with it. Cars are very small and one has gone into the abyss under the couch I think. I need to get a tiny wooden box to store the cars in so we don't lose them
Easy and simple for little one to figure out and actually fun for adults to tinker with too.
Great classic toy which is providing hours of fun.
Les jouets en bois sont les jouets que j’aime offrir à mon petit fils!
Good quality product. As advertised.Only thing is the cars get stuck quite often in the transitions, which sucks.Overall good toy, will keep a long time if we don’t lose the cars.
